document_data.name: Razorfangs
document_data.mainbody: '''''Razorfangs''''' was a [[spell]] that could only be cast by [[dragon]]s.
document_data.Effects: This spell was an improved version of the ''[[Sharptooth (spell)|sharptooth]]'' spell. When cast, this allowed a dragon to alter their teeth to make them incredibly hard, sharp and strong. It was cast before battle or when a dragon was trying to eat a rather hard-to-chew meal, like a knight.
document_data.Casting: This spell required only a [[Verbal component|verbal]] component.
